price: Deε εwͻ soro ne deε a εwͻ asaase so nyinaa bͻ Nyankopͻn abodin. Ɔno na Ahennie no wͻ no, na Ɔno na aseda ne nkamfoͻ wͻ no; Ɔno na ͻwͻ biribiara so tumi.
arabic: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ لَهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yusabbiḥu lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi lahu al-mul'ku walahu al-ḥamdu wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
